title: Medicine Protocols for COVID-19 Vaccines - HSE.ie
cleaned_text: Medicine Protocols to support the administration of COVID-19 vaccines Please refresh your webpage to see the most up to date information Nurses and Midwives (working to a medicines protocol) Registered Optometrists Registered Physiotherapists Registered Radiographers and Radiation Therapists Student Vaccinators [Vaccinator Training Plan - COVID-19 Vaccination Programme](https://www.hse.ie/eng/health/immunisation/hcpinfo/covid19vaccineinfo4hps/vaccinator-training-plan.pdf) [Vaccinator Training Plan - Addendum Phase 2 - COVID-19 Vaccination Programme](https://www.hse.ie/eng/health/immunisation/hcpinfo/covid19vaccineinfo4hps/addendum-ph-2-vaccinator-training-plan.pdf) This document sets out the training requirements for clinical students and new registered professionals (radiographers, radiation therapists and dental hygienists). Please note: this document should be read in conjunction with the Vaccinator Training Plan v2.0 and the Practice Protocol v2.0 Go back to [COVID-19 Vaccine Information for Health Professionals](https://www.hse.ie/eng/health/immunisation/hcpinfo/covid19vaccineinfo4hps/) This page was updated on 14 June 2023
